attributes.action: Raise the legal age for consumption or purchase of alcohol to 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many young people are on the streets creating mayhem and persecution due to the adverse effects of alcohol.
Many of these look older than their actual age therefore allowing them to purchase alcohol illegally.
If the age limit was raised to 21 then this would drastically reduce the estimated £20 million pound a year alcohol abuse costs the tax payers.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/21alco/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
